question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/verifier/module_init.rs] [Function: legacy_verify_module_init_function()] [Deterministic Verification] Is the enumerate().find() ordering guaranteed to be deterministic across all validator nodes, or can iterator implementation differences cause validation inconsistencies? (Critical)

(Medium)
